metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000671 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: sympa version 6.2.16 and later contains a CWE-601: URL Redirection toUntrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in The "referer" parameterof the wwsympa.fcgi login action. that can result in Open redirection andreflected XSS via data URIs. This attack appear to be exploitable viaVictim's browser must follow a URL supplied by the attacker. Thisvulnerability appears to have been fixed in none available.

criterions.comment: sympa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
